official_title: Effects of eCulinary Medicine Emphasizing Herbs and Spices to Increase Vegetable Consumption Among Adults With Hypertension
inclusion_criteria:
* Clinical diagnosis hypertension
* Age above 18
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 80 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Use of tobacco
* Self-reported history of chronic diseases other than hypertension
* Allergy to any food
* Pregnant or lactating
* Alcohol or drug dependence
